# Magic Convalescence (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[5th Level Bard Spells|Bard 5]], [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a specially prepared, scented ointment)

**Range:** 20 ft.

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on you

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 118

*You alter the flow of magic about your body so that spells heal you.*

Whenever a creature, including you, casts a spell within the area of this spell, you heal 1 hit point per level of the spell cast. The effect of each spell cast is resolved prior to your receiving the healing.
